title: performance-focused code review
description: find hot paths, excessive allocations, and algorithmic issues; propose fixes.
context: be pragmatic; prefer complexity-reducing changes with measurable impact.
instructions: 1) identify critical sections and hot loops. 2) estimate time/space complexity and data sizes. 3) propose concrete optimizations with tradeoffs. 4) suggest quick wins and deeper refactors. return a concise diff or code blocks.
